code: import{combineReducers}from"redux";import{persistReducer}from"redux-persist";import shopReducer from"./shop/shop.reducer";import directoryReducer from"./directory/directory.reducer";import storageSession from"redux-persist/lib/storage/session";import userReducer from"./user/user.reducer";import cartReducer from"./cart/cart.reducer";var rootReducer=combineReducers({user:userReducer,cart:cartReducer,directory:directoryReducer,shop:shopReducer});var persistConfig={key:"root",storage:storageSession,whiteList:["cart"]};export default persistReducer(persistConfig,rootReducer);
